law.text: No director of pupil personnel or other person shall willfully or fraudulently report a larger number of children of school age in any district than the actual number, or otherwise make a false report of the census.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 20, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 223, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 7. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4434-28.
